API.Comments: Finds a VarHandle for an array type.
Returns an enum constant of the type specified by type with the name specified by name.
Finds a VarHandle for an instance field.
API.Function: fieldVarHandle(MethodHandles.Lookup lookup,String name,Class<VarHandle> type,Class<?> declaringClass,Class<?> fieldType)

API.Comments: Returns the value of a static final field declared in the class which is the same as the field's type (or, for primitive-valued fields, declared in the wrapper class.)
Returns the value of a static final field.
Returns the result of invoking a method handle with the provided arguments.
API.Function: invoke(MethodHandles.Lookup lookup,String name,Class<?> type,MethodHandle handle,Object... args)

API.Comments: Returns a null object reference for the reference type specified by type.
Returns a Class mirror for the primitive type whose type descriptor is specified by name.
Finds a VarHandle for a static field.
API.Function: staticFieldVarHandle(MethodHandles.Lookup lookup,String name,Class<VarHandle> type,Class<?> declaringClass,Class<?> fieldType)
